property.name: text
property.value: Model of a pivoting arm with a point mass that bounces off a surface when approaching from above.

property.name: text
property.value: <scratch>Let's try event-triggered -- be notified only of bounces</scratch> Try continuous-time control with analytical interpolation of the ideal trajectory, then take the error signal for a controller. Once we have a continuous-time controller, create the sampled-data controller and see how coarse the samples can be. Try a proportional controller on the angular velocity.
